name: Mighty Treasure Hunt
description:
Mighty Treasure Hunt is a top-down puzzle game about a boy that wants to follow his vanished friend on a quest to find the almighty treasure. To help our protagonist, walk around the four level maps to find and gather clues left behind by the mysteriously disappeared friend, so that they can be pieced together and form a sequence, which is the key to proceed to the next level map, and as well, tells our main character the story left behind. 

  • Single-player puzzle game
  • Interact with the clues and organize them
  • Simple inputs

Controls

  • Move with the arrow keys
  • Interact with the A button (Z key)
  • Open the puzzle menu with the B button (X key)
